title: V2 virtual punch camera does not work
content: The first time the virtual punch is installed on a laptop or a desktop and after the first time, the badge number is inserted.Chrome will ask the user if he will allow Chrome to access the camera, you need to Allow. If it still doesn't work:Check the camera settings in Chrome and allow Chrome to access it,Check the computer's security and privacy settings as well. When you have allowed access to the camera on Google Chrome, the camera to the right of the search bar will no longer be accompanied by the red cross as in the first picture. Helpful?00Updated: 4 years ago Share :
